features1.title: Unified AI/ML Infrastructure Platform
features1.description: Supports multiple frameworks and workloads for comprehensive AI/ML needs.

features1.title: Customized User Authentication
features1.description: Role-based access ensures secure, tailored environments for different user categories.

features2.title: Container Configuration and Orchestration
features2.description: Simplifies Docker/Workspace job submissions with efficient container management and scaling.

features2.title: Robust Billing and Resource Allocation
features2.description: Transparent billing with real-time visibility into resource usage and allocation.

features2.title: High Availability and Fault Tolerance
features2.description: Ensures continuous availability by storing containers on alternative nodes.

features2.title: Pre-installed GPU Libraries
features2.description: Provides pre-configured GPU libraries for quick integration and optimized performance.
